title: Salesman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a person to sell a product to at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you sell to a player with a limited usage of their ability, you will successfully sell a product to them, and they will gain an extra use of their ability.
- This role may not be rolled if there are not any players in the game with limited uses of their ability.

desc:
Post 248
*Hi, Billy Mays here for a special TV offer!*
